task.title: Including dynamic content in a SVG

context.p: XSLT-Conref lets you create dynamic graphical content by including referenced content in vector graphics.

The script svg-simple-test.xsl generates an SVG graphic of a box with static dimensions, and inserts the title of the DITA topic with XSLT-Conref. The referenced text is inserted centered with constant text size. Automatic line wrapping or scaling is not supported yet.
After changing the referenced topic title, click the refresh button to display the changes in the graphic. You do not have to save the file first.
